about_the_game:
BEAUTIFUL DESOLATION SOUNDTRACK


This soundtrack was composed by Mick Gordon and The Brotherhood.

Mick is a composer and sound designer whose work aims to transcend the perceptual boundary between music and its context. He has lovingly crafted many of the compositions for BEAUTIFUL DESOLATION. This amazing musical score weaves a unique African sound into his music.

Includes: MP3 and FLAC options.

  • The Soundtrack should be automatically added to your Steam Music Library
